about.title: about me
content: I’m an ambitious problem solver with a new passion for coding, and old passion for art, science and knowledge in general and I  would like to join a team of like-minded people and environment. I am thorough and precise in everything I do with a keen interest to better myself everyday. As someone who takes responsibility for my own personal development, I am continually evaluating and upgrading my skills so that I  stay at the cutting edge of my growth as a web developer. I am a natural problem solver with a sharp eye for details and I always go the extra mile to keep the lowest entropy possible but also making use of it for creative and learning purposes.
